There is a chair and a table in the room, and windows with curtains can be seen in the background. Several paintings are hanging on the wall. The blue tin can is placed on the stool in front of him. The man throws a black card toward the tin can; it flies past the front of the can. Then the man throws another black card, this time it hits the edge of the tin can and falls to the ground. The man throws another card, but it still doesn't hit the tin can.
